title: Traditional Festive Essential Oil Yule | Natural Aromatherapy Blend | Amaru Aromatherapy
description: Transport yourself to the enchanting spirit of the holidays with our Traditional Festive Essential Oil Yule. Crafted with natural ingredients, including cinnamon, clove, and sweet orange, this blend is perfect for creating a warm and inviting ambiance in your home. Infused with the traditional scents of Yule, this essential oil blend is perfect for diffusing or adding to your bath for a rejuvenating and calming experience. Shop now and discover the magic of the season with Amaru Aromatherapy.
cleaned_text: Authentic & Organic Traditional Essential Oil Yule: A Festive Blend for Home and Self Yule is Festive, Spicy and Citrusy - Imagine Three Wise Women bearing Frankincense, Cinnamon and Sweet Oranges pressed with Clove buds. Truly enchanting. This most beloved seasonal synergy is a favourite for many during the holiday season bringing spicy sunshine into your nourishing time with friends and family. Ingredients: Frankincense, Sweet Orange, Clove and Cinnamon imbued with blessings for sacred time with family and friends, nurturing relationships and ceremonial cleansing of space. Suggested Use: 30-40 drops with Distilled water in an 80ml glass/metal spray bottle Diffuser: 5-7 drops in the water diffuser This product is not intended to treat, diagnose, or cure any disease and does not replace your medical practitioners advice.
